askemo:0000001.name: population
askemo:0000001.description: The number of people who live in an area being modeled.

askemo:0000002.name: doubling time
askemo:0000002.description: The length of time that an infectious disease requires to double in incidence.

askemo:0000003.name: recovery time
askemo:0000003.description: The length of time an infected individual needs to recover after being infected.

askemo:0000004.name: infectious time
askemo:0000004.description: The length of time an infected individual is infectious after being infected.
